name: Megaloptura - for PC and Xbox (Canceled)
blurb: Megaloptura is a top down, coin-op alien bug slaying video game\non PC and XBOX 360.

rewards.reward: Supporter Package -- DIGITAL DOWNLOAD.\r\nThank you for your support! Every backer for this level will get a digital download of Megaloptura!
Megaloptura Package -- HD WALLPAPER + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD. Kickstarters for this level will receive our HD Megaloptura Wallpapers (at least 6) and a digital download of Megaloptura.

Immersion Package -- DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD + HD WALLPAPER + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD. Jump into the game with the immersion package, you will receive all previous tier items and a digital download of the Megaloptura soundtrack.

Enlistment Package -- CUSTOM NEURON DOG TAG BOTTLE OPENER + DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD + HD WALLPAPER + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD. Become one of us! Use your Neuron Games bottle opener to open all kinds of bottles.

A Mouse is Forever Package -- MOUSE PAD + CUSTOM NEURON DOG TAG BOTTLE OPENER + DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD + HD WALLPAPER + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD.  Show your mouse some love and delve into action packed gameplay with an HD Megaloptura mouse pad!  You will receive all previous tiered items.

YOLO Package -- NAME IN CREDITS + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD. You only live once or in this case as many coins as you can cram into the machine. Be our hero and we will immortalize you in our video game credits, giving a special shout out to you uber supportive Kicksters.  You will receive your name in the credits and a digital copy of the game.

I WANT IT ALL Package -- NAME IN CREDITS + MOUSE PAD + CUSTOM NEURON DOG TAG BOTTLE OPENER + DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD + HD WALLPAPER + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD.  YOLO Package plus all the added goodies.  You will receive your name in the credits along with all items listed in the \u201cA MOUSE IS FOREVER\u201d package.

YOU BE THE MAN! Package -- NAME AND PHOTO IN CREDITS + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD . Really want to be immortalized? Get your shiny mug plastered into Megalopturas credits for all to see.   You will receive  your name and photo in the credits and a digital copy of the game.

YOU BE THE BAMF! Package -- NAME AND PHOTO IN CREDITS + MOUSE PAD + CUSTOM NEURON DOG TAG BOTTLE OPENER + DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD + HD WALLPAPER + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD. Not all of us can be a BAMF, so we left this one for you. You will get your picture and name in the game credits and all items listed in the \u201cA MOUSE IS FOREVER\u201d package.

Gear Up Package -- AMD 6950 GRAPHICS CARD + MOUSE PAD + CUSTOM NEURON DOG TAG BOTTLE OPENER + DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD + HD WALLPAPER + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD. Beef up your puter and start slaying! You will receive an AMD Sapphire 6950 HD along with all items listed in the \u201cA MOUSE IS FOREVER\u201d package.

Cuddle Party Package -- Meet The Team (Skype) and get Dropbox / GoogleDrive Design Media Access + MOUSE PAD + CUSTOM NEURON DOG TAG BOTTLE OPENER + DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD + HD WALLPAPER + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD. Pick our craniums, meet with us for an hour, ask us questions, share game ideas and get to know more about the industry. Additionally get exclusive access to our treasure trove of media on Google Drive/Dropbox filled with character art, design docs and a whole lot more. All previous items included except AMD graphics card and your name / photo in credits.

Cuddle Party Adventure Package -- Meet The Team (Skype) and get Dropbox / GoogleDrive Design Media Access + NAME AND PHOTO IN CREDITS + MOUSE PAD + CUSTOM NEURON DOG TAG BOTTLE OPENER + DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD + HD WALLPAPER + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD. Almost the same cuddle party, but with the added benefit of being immortalized in Megaloptura's credits. You still get exclusive access to our treasure trove of media on Google Drive/Dropbox filled with character art, design docs and a whole lot more. All previous items included except AMD graphics card.

Come and see the team package! -- TRIP TO SEE NEURON + NAME AND PHOTO IN CREDITS + MOUSE PAD + CUSTOM NEURON DOG TAG BOTTLE OPENER + DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD + HD WALLPAPER + DIGITAL DOWNLOAD. We have brewed up something special for this package, a challenge for all looking to make this project happen in an instant. We will fly you out to Colorado where you will be greeted by the Neuron team, put up in a hotel and escorted to dinner.  During this time we will answer questions, sign ABSOLUTELY ANYTHING and take lots and lots of pictures. (Continental US only).
